Description.Name: Voyage to the Vault
Description.Details: An encrypted packet arrives quickly after the call with Arelle ended—coordinates, mission tags, and a name that sent an immediate ripple through the crew: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMajestyMetals],Majesty Metals and Manufacturing]]. It's another major corporation, will this be [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVicore],Vicore]] all over? The crew gathers around the holotable as jump preparation alerts begin to echo through the Argo’s corridors. Yang leans in, expression wary. “Dunianshire VI. That’s no fringe outpost. Majesty Metals is one of the biggest industrial players in the Inner Sphere, even out here on the edge. They make everything—‘Mech chassis, armored plating, weapon frameworks, even bulk atmospheric components. If they’ve got a vault hidden there, it’s not just valuable—it’s probably cutting-edge.” Farah taps a readout, frowning. “The vault’s buried under one of their older prototype facilities, tied into Factory Circumference Alpha right outside [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGiggleswick],Giggleswick]]. That’s an R&D spine for their assault mech division. Might be weapon schematics, maybe structural enhancements... but definitely something the [[DM.Factions[faction_MinnesotaTribe],Tribe]] wants intact.” Sumire raises an eyebrow. “Wait—does [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Dunianshire].OwnerValue.FactionDef,{DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Dunianshire].OwnerValue.FactionDef.Name}]] even know we’re coming? Dunianshire is their space. And what about Majesty’s own security teams? If they see our 'Mechs stomping toward one of their black sites, are we sure they won’t open fire?” Silence follows, no one answers. You all glance at one another. Darius shrugs. “We’ve got coordinates, authorization tags, and a job. We’ll have to trust Arelle squared things on her end.” Sumire mutters, “Right. Trust the Watch. Never goes wrong.” You nod. The decision’s made. The Argo’s course is locked. Majesty’s vault waits on Dunianshire VI—and whatever’s inside, the Minnesota Tribe is already on the move.

Description.Name: Immediately travel to Dunianshire
Description.Details: You lean against the command rail. “Farah, give me the rundown on Dunianshire VI.” She keys a few commands into the console beside her. “Mid-sized temperate world. Breathable atmosphere, though a little tainted—nothing filters can’t handle. Just under standard gravity. It’s got three moons, so tides can get messy.” A planetary map appears overhead. “Population’s mostly settled across three continents—Brittayne, Battery, and Kongolia. Capital city is Londinium. Agriculture’s the backbone, but there’s also some heavy industry.” Farah highlights a zone on the southern landmass. “As for the mission area—Giggleswick. Old [[DM.Factions[faction_SLDF],SLDF]] base turned military installation. Now controlled by Majesty Metals. That’s the real strategic asset.” She purses her lips. “If the Tribe’s operating out here, they’re probably not after farmland.” You nod in agreement, before giving the signal to leave for Dunianshire.

Description.Name: Hold the departure
Description.Details: You lean against the command rail. “Farah, give me the rundown on Dunianshire VI.” She keys a few commands into the console beside her. “Mid-sized temperate world. Breathable atmosphere, though a little tainted—nothing filters can’t handle. Just under standard gravity. It’s got three moons, so tides can get messy.” A planetary map appears overhead. “Population’s mostly settled across three continents—Brittayne, Battery, and Kongolia. Capital city is Londinium. Agriculture’s the backbone, but there’s also some light industry.” Farah highlights a zone on the southern landmass. “As for the mission area—Giggleswick. Old [[DM.Factions[faction_SLDF],SLDF]] base turned military installation. Now controlled by Majesty Metals. That’s the real strategic asset.” She purses her lips. “If the Tribe’s operating out here, they’re probably not after farmland.” “I agree with that assessment. Let's make sure we are fully prepared on the way there.”, you respond to Farah. You are not ready to depart quite yet, but the Tribe can only wait for so long. [A new flashpoint has been created in the Dunianshire system to continue the campaign]
